name: Tetrising
description:
GAME GOALS

In TetRising your goal is to escape from the pit or get crushed by huge cargo blocks falling from above!

Use your puzzling skills to carefully place blocks or drop them and let the gravity do the work!

If you run of space for falling blocks you will fail! Avoid falling blocks and don't let them stay at the yellow warning stripes!

INSTRUCTIONS

WSAD to move your player

SPACEBAR to jump

LEFT/RIGHT ARROW to move falling blocks

UP ARROW to rotate the active block

DOWN ARROW to drop the active block

List any content that was created before the jam.
  • All decals used from the Quixel library
  • Music and sounds used from WeLoveIndies.com
